name: Heroku Ping
description: A ruby application to keep Heroku Dynos alive.

PING_URL.description: One or multiple URLs to ping, separated by commas.

PING_METHOD.description: HTTP request method used for pinging; either HEAD or GET

PING_INTERVAL.description: Time between pings. Specified in seconds.

PING_VERIFY_SSL.description: Should we expect valid SSL certificate if URI begins with `https`?
